(Simplified: 绻)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 卷 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 卷 [ juǎn ] book, scroll, volume; curled up; to curl, to roll
①(繾綣)見“彎曲，屈：綣領。繾”。[合]綣領(翻領。)

綣字的基本解释

綣
quǎn
见“绻”。

綣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quǎn］
［《廣韻》去阮切，上阮，溪。］
［《廣韻》去願切，去願，溪。］
“绻1”的繁体字。
(1)缱绻。谓相结牢固，不离散。引申作眷恋。
(2)屈服。
(3)见“綣綣”。

綣字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綣； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页926第36
【廣韻】去阮切【集韻】【韻會】苦遠切，?音捲。【說文·新附字】繾綣也。【廣韻】繾綣志盟。【類篇】繾綣，厚意。【詩·大雅】以謹繾綣。【傳】繾綣，反覆也。【左傳·昭二十五年】繾綣從公。【註】繾綣，不離散。　又【淮南子·汜論訓】古者有鍪而綣領，以王天下者矣。【註】綣領，皮衣屈而紩之。　又【廣韻】去願切【集韻】區願切，?音券。義同。　又【韻補】叶苦殞切。【釋名】囷綣也。藏物繾綣，束縛之也。殞字原从歺，不从歹。

考證：〔【淮南子·汜論訓】古若有鍪而綣領，以王天下者矣。〕　謹照原文古若改古者。

[Guang Yun] Go to Ruan Che [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] bitter and far cut,? Sound volume. 【Said Wen·New Attached Word】缱绻也. [Guangyun] The League of Legends. 【Classes】Single, generous. 【Poetry·Daya】Take a string of thoughtfulness. [Biography] 缱绻, repetitive. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-five Years of Zhao] Xianlong Cong Gong. 【Note】Single, not discrete.　[Huinanzi·Pun Lun Xun] The ancients had a satin and silk collar, and they were the king of the world. [Note] The silk collar, the leather jacket is bent and weak.　 [Guang Yun] Go to wish to cut [Ji Yun] District wish to cut,? Sound coupons. The same meaning.　[Rhyme Filling] The leaves are bitterly cut. 【Release name】Holding a lot. The possessions are tight, and they are bound. The word death was originally from Xiao, not from evil.
